answers.answer: Thank you Medhelp for creating this forum so that we can reach out to others all around the world and make a difference in their lives!  My best to all of you!

question: We hope you will join us in thanking everyone at the Juvenile Diabetes Research Foundation for volunteering their time and expertise to answer questions in this forum!Med Help wishes everyone here a very happy holiday season and hope that your new year is filled with good health, much laughter and lots of love!Med Help International
title: THANK YOU JDRF and HAPPY HOLIDAYS TO ALL!
